name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Skilled in **project management**, **customer communication**, and **team coordination**, with 13+ years as a Full Stack Developer delivering high-performance applications in healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **mechanical** and **electrical** systems, ensuring seamless **installation** and **maintenance**. Experienced in **continuous improvement** practices and advanced **problem-solving** techniques. Adept in utilizing cloud services such as **AWS** and **Azure**, leveraging frameworks and libraries like **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django** to enhance system capabilities. Successfully built systems following compliance standards such as HIPAA and FHIR, with hands-on experience in **IIOT** and deploying microservices architectures. Recognized for developing AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing.
